body.p: You will please accept my resignation as "Second Lieutenant of the National Blues Company B. Louisville Battallion, Kentucky State Guard" as I find it uterly impossible to fulfill all obligations arising from Said office, without a sacrifice to my business.

I am very Respectfully
Your Obt Servant
Henry C. Anderson.

To Hon. Bariah Magoffin
Commander in Chief
Kentucky State Guard
I hereby recommend that 2nd Lieut H. C. Anderson be resignation be accepted-

Respt yours &c
A. L. Symmes
Capt. Comd. N. B.s
Resignation
H. C. Anderson
2d Leuit
National Blues
Red Dec 18 1860
